symmetry_equivalence.description: Checks if two vacancy defects are symmetry equivalent.

vacancy_string_representation.description: String representation of the vacancy defect, indicating the element and site index.

vacancy_oxidation_state.description: Oxidation state of the vacancy defect.

vacancy_charge_states.description: Possible charge states for the vacancy defect.

vacancy_multiplicity.description: Multiplicity of the vacancy defect, indicating the number of symmetry-equivalent sites.

vacancy_supercell_formula.description: Chemical formula of the supercell structure containing the vacancy defect.

vacancy_name.description: Name of the vacancy defect, typically indicating the element involved.

vacancy_self_equivalence.description: Checks if the vacancy defect is equivalent to itself.

vacancy_element_changes.description: Changes in the number of elements due to the vacancy defect.

vacancy_latex_name.description: LaTeX formatted name of the vacancy defect for scientific documentation.
